title: Command Medium and Large Picture Hanging Strips, Damage Free Hangers, No Tools Wall Strips for Living Spaces, White, 12 Pairs 16
description: Command White Medium and Large Picture Hanging Strips let you decorate how you want, when you want, without damaging your walls and surfaces. A great home improvement item, these picture hangers stick on a variety of smooth surfaces without leaving holes, marks or sticky residue. Use these wall hanging strips to hang picture frames, college dorm decor, wooden letters, nursery decor, calendars or even to create a gallery wall. Simply mount these picture strips on painted walls, finished wood and tiles and enjoy the damage free hanging of your favorite decorations. Perfect for home renovators and college students, use these Command Picture Hanging Strips in your home, office, apartment or dorm room to elevate the appearance of your living or working space without tools. Directions are included that show how to use the 3M Wall Hanging Strips. A clever decorating solution that doesn’t damage surfaces, these wall hanger strips will help you fearlessly change your space. One package contains 12 pairs of medium and 16 pairs of large white picture hanging strips. Four pairs of medium strips hold up to 12 pounds with a max frame of 18 x 24 inches. Four pairs of large strips hold up to 16 pounds with a max frame size of 24 x 36 inches. Decorate, organize and celebrate damage-free with Command.
